name: Cactus Arcade
description:
This 45 meg collection offers the very best of the games currently available on the site. With no less than 17 games of genres ranging from shoot em ups and platformers to adventure games and first person shooters.

Contains:
Burn the trash, Clean Asia!, Fractal Fighter, Fuck Space, God Came to the Cave, Illegal Communication, Minubeat, Mondo Agency, Mondo Mecials, MSOIDS, Protoganda, Psychosomnium, Retro II, Seizuredome, Shotgun Ninja, The Design and xWUNG.
